metadata.name: AWS CloudTrail Important Change
metadata.comment: Detects disabling, deleting and updating of a Trail

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('cloudtrail.amazonaws.com') AND (lower(LOWER(metadata.event_code)) in ('stoplogging', 'updatetrail', 'deletetrail')))

output.summary: Detects disabling, deleting and updating of a Trail

metadata.objective: False positive: Valid change in a Trail Reference: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/awscloudtrail/latest/userguide/best-practices-security.html
